content: helix hats yarn any worsted-weight yarn in at least three colors a b and c use up using smaller needles and color a cast on 88 stitches join to knit all those bits in your in the round *k1 p1 repeat to end of round until brim is 1 5-3 stash switch to larger needles and knit one round in color a needles drop color a and begin knitting in color b for 44 sts drop b and begin knitting in color c until you reach color a knit with a until us6 and 8 16 circular and you reach b drop a and knit with b until you reach c etc do not double points cross the ends or doing anything special when changing colors simply drop the color you re knitting with pick up the next color and continue on if you run out of a color just tie on a new one and gauge keep going 18 stitches/4 in stocki- continuing in helix stripes until your hat is 7 from the cast on edge nette stitch or longer is you want a slouchier fit continue in helix stripes as you work the decreases notions decrease set up *knit 11 place marker repeat from * to end of round stitch markers tapestry decrease round 1 *knit to 2 stitches before marker k2tog knit two needle stitches together repeat from * to end of round decrease round 2 knit repeat these two decrease rounds until there are 6 stitches between size the markers switching to double points when necessary adult small/child adult repeat decrease round 1 until 8 total stitches remain 19 55 circumference cut yarn and thread tail through stitches snug up stitches and weave in the tail on the inside of the hat weave in all ends by jessica rose www rose-kim com
